titleStmt.title: Field by field register of land at Kerkeosiris

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: (lines 6 ff.) Adjacent on the north, projecting 1/2 1/4 1/8 1/16 schoinion west of the property previously surveyed, 4 1/2 arouras taxed at 4 artabas per aroura, held by Phmouis son of Pathebis, measuring 1 1/2 1/4 1/16 x 1 1/2 1/4 1/16 x 2 1/4 1/8 1/32 x 2 1/4 1/8 1/32 schoinia, total 4 1/4 1/16 1/64 arouras of which (ï¿½) the remainder in lentils. Adjacent on the north, forming a western boundary of the next lot, receding 1/8 1/16 schoinion west of the unsurveyed land, a further parcel measuring 1 1/2 1/8 x 1/2 1/4 1/8 1/16 x 1 1/8 1/16 1/32 x 1 1/4 1/8 1/16, total 1 1/2 1/8 1/16 1/64, grand total 6 1/32 arouras, 1 1/2 in excess (of the proper 4 1/2). Adjacent on the east, projecting 2 1/4 1/8 /132 schoinia south of the previously surveyed property, 2 arouras of salt land which has been declared derelict since year 40 (of Ptolemy VIII Euergetes II), measuring 1/4 1/8 x 1/4 x 3 1/2 1/8 x 3 1/2 1/8, total 1 1/8 1/32 arouras salt land. Adjacent on the north, projecting 1/2 1/4 1/8 1/16 schoinion west of the property previously surveyed, the remainder of the derelict land, measuring 1 1/8 1/16 x 1 x 1 1/8 1/16 x 1 1/2, total 1 1/2 1/8 1/32. Adjacent on the north, receding 1/2 1/4 1/8 1/16 schoinion east of the fields about Tali, the remainder, measuring 1/8 x 1/8 x 2 1/8 x 2 1/8, total 4 1/64. Total derelict, 3 1/16 arouras.
